languages.text: Почтенный Ульфар, покинув свиту Вольного Торговца, в одиночку отправился на поиски своей славной стаи. Братья его из стаи Грозовых укусов разыскивали непокорного Волка, но безуспешно — он сгинул во тьме Простора навеки.

The esteemed Ulfar left the Rogue Trader's retinue and set out alone in search of his glorious pack. The Stormbiters tried to locate the defiant Wolf, but to no avail. He was forever lost in the darkness of the Expanse.
languages.original_text: Почтенный Ульфар, покинув свиту Вольного Торговца, в одиночку отправился на поиски своей славной стаи. Братья его из стаи Грозовых укусов разыскивали непокорного Волка, но безуспешно — он сгинул во тьме Простора навеки.

traits.locale_text: The honourable Ulfar left the Rogue Trader's retinue and set out alone in search for his glorious pack. The Stormbiters tried to locate the defiant Wolf, but to no avail. He was forever lost in the darkness of the Expanse.

The esteemed Ulfar left the Rogue Trader's retinue and set out alone in search of his glorious pack. The Stormbiters tried to locate the defiant Wolf, but to no avail. He was forever lost in the darkness of the Expanse.

The esteemed Ulfar left the Rogue Trader's retinue and set out alone in search of his glorious pack. The Stormbiters tried to locate the defiant Wolf, but to no avail. He was forever lost in the darkness of the Expanse.

languages.text: 受人尊敬的乌尔法离开了行商浪人的舰队，独自出发寻找他光荣的狼群。噬风者狼群试图找到这只桀骜不驯的野狼，但徒劳无功。乌尔法彻底消失在了科罗努斯扩区的黑暗之中。
languages.original_text: The esteemed Ulfar left the Rogue Trader's retinue and set out alone in search of his glorious pack. The Stormbiters tried to locate the defiant Wolf, but to no avail. He was forever lost in the darkness of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: 受人尊敬的乌尔法离开了行商浪人的舰队，独自出发寻找他光荣的狼群。噬风者狼群试图找到这只桀骜不驯的野狼，但徒劳无功。乌尔法彻底消失在了科罗努斯扩区的黑暗之中。

languages.text: 名高きウルファーはローグトレーダーの従者の一団を去り、彼の愉快な群れを探すべく独りで旅に出た。嵐喰いの者たちがこの不敵なウルフの所在を突き止めようとしたが、無駄足だった。彼は永遠にエクスパンスの闇の中へ消えた。
languages.original_text: The esteemed Ulfar left the Rogue Trader's retinue and set out alone in search of his glorious pack. The Stormbiters tried to locate the defiant Wolf, but to no avail. He was forever lost in the darkness of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: 名高きウルファーはローグトレーダーの従者の一団を去り、彼の愉快な群れを探すべく独りで旅に出た。嵐喰いの者たちがこの不敵なウルフの所在を突き止めようとしたが、無駄足だった。彼は永遠にエクスパンスの闇の中へ消えた。

languages.text: L'honorable Ulfar quitta l'entourage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} pour se mettre seul en quête de sa glorieuse meute. Les Crocs de la tempête tentèrent de localiser le Wolf rebelle, mais en vain. Il disparut à jamais dans les ténèbres des Étendues.
languages.original_text: The esteemed Ulfar left the Rogue Trader's retinue and set out alone in search of his glorious pack. The Stormbiters tried to locate the defiant Wolf, but to no avail. He was forever lost in the darkness of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: L'honorable Ulfar quitta l'entourage {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} pour se mettre seul en quête de sa glorieuse meute. Les Crocs de la tempête tentèrent de localiser le Wolf rebelle, mais en vain. Il disparut à jamais dans les ténèbres des Étendues.

languages.text: El estimado Ulfar dejó el séquito de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente y se marchó en solitario para dar con el paradero de su gloriosa jauría. Los Muerdetormentas trataron de encontrar al Lobo temerario, pero fue en vano. Se perdió para siempre en la oscuridad de la Extensión.
languages.original_text: The esteemed Ulfar left the Rogue Trader's retinue and set out alone in search of his glorious pack. The Stormbiters tried to locate the defiant Wolf, but to no avail. He was forever lost in the darkness of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: El estimado Ulfar dejó el séquito de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente y se marchó en solitario para dar con el paradero de su gloriosa jauría. Los Muerdetormentas trataron de encontrar al Lobo temerario, pero fue en vano. Se perdió para siempre en la oscuridad de la Extensión.

languages.text: Der geschätzte Ulfar verließ das Gefolge {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} und machte sich alleine auf die Suche nach seinem ruhmreichen Rudel. Die Stormbiters versuchten, den eigensinnigen Wolf aufzuspüren, scheiterten aber. Er war für immer in der Dunkelheit der Ausdehnung verschollen.
languages.original_text: The esteemed Ulfar left the Rogue Trader's retinue and set out alone in search of his glorious pack. The Stormbiters tried to locate the defiant Wolf, but to no avail. He was forever lost in the darkness of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Der geschätzte Ulfar verließ das Gefolge {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} und machte sich alleine auf die Suche nach seinem ruhmreichen Rudel. Die Stormbiters versuchten, den eigensinnigen Wolf aufzuspüren, scheiterten aber. Er war für immer in der Dunkelheit der Ausdehnung verschollen.

languages.text: Saygıdeğer Ulfar, Hür Tacir'in maiyetinden ayrıldı ve şanlı sürüsünü aramak için kendi başına yola koyuldu. Borayutanlar, cüretkâr Kurt'un yerini tespit etmeye çalıştı ancak başarılı olamadı. Ulfar, Enginlik'in karanlığında sonsuza dek kayboldu.
languages.original_text: The esteemed Ulfar left the Rogue Trader's retinue and set out alone in search of his glorious pack. The Stormbiters tried to locate the defiant Wolf, but to no avail. He was forever lost in the darkness of the Expanse.

traits.locale_text: Saygıdeğer Ulfar, Hür Tacir'in maiyetinden ayrıldı ve şanlı sürüsünü aramak için kendi başına yola koyuldu. Borayutanlar, cüretkâr Kurt'un yerini tespit etmeye çalıştı ancak başarılı olamadı. Ulfar, Enginlik'in karanlığında sonsuza dek kayboldu.
